ComicInfo.Title: The Silver Annimercenary!
ComicInfo.Summary: Special 25th anniversary issue in which the coat burglar (from issues #4 and 16) returns and is seeking revenge against ALF. How does the coat burglar get his revenge? He kidnaps ALF and holds him for ransom and the Tanners try to figure out a way to rescue their furry alien friend in "The Silver Annimercenary." Issue also has an ALF 25th Anniversary pinup.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:36:16. [CVDB56920]
ComicInfo.Editor: Lisa Trusiani, Sid Jacobson, Tom DeFalco
ComicInfo.Characters: ALF, Brian Tanner, Dorothy Halligan, Eric Tanner, Kate Tanner, Lynn Tanner, Willie Tanner
